sub_title: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.
summary:
With an unrivalled passion for the power of storytelling, I’m always down to embrace the next great narrative challenge, interactive production, and rewarding collaborative experience. Whether it’s creating high-concept pitches, shepherding multi-platform IP, producing engaging multimedia content, forging series bibles, or crafting rich character-driven dialogue:  I am game to help your story shine!

And with nearly two decades in the AAA and mobile gaming trenches—along with masterminding the world's first 'motion comic epic’, and creating acclaimed original IP across multiple platforms— I pride myself on bringing some serious narrative ammunition to a storytelling gunfight. I’ve also been blessed with continued accolades on the journey: 

Sundance Film Festival — Audience Award (Digital Series)
Telefilm Canada — Screenplay/New Media Grant Winner (x3)
Canadian New Media Awards — Producer of the Year
iTunes Store/Google Play Awards — Editor’s Choice (Game)
Horizon Interactive Media Awards — Best in Show (Series)
Gelett Burgess Children’s Awards — Best YA Mystery (Novel)
Moonbeam Children’s Awards — Silver Medal (Novel)
SaskFilm Development Grant Winner — Original Screenplay
Society of Voice Arts and Sciences — Audiobook Excellence

Specialties: Producing, Writing, World-Building, Producing, Narrative Design, Series Bibles, Directing (Voice and Animation), Audio Design, Public Speaking, Pitching, Voiceover, and multi-platform storytelling.

treasury_media.title: HABTIC: Your Work. Your Life. Better.
treasury_media.description: The world's first comprehensive corporate wellness solution is here! For the past two years I've served Narrative and Creative Engagement Director for this revolutionary wellness platform. Featuring a personalised digital coaching system, an engaging collection of science-supported content, and an evolving AI backbone to serve user mental, physical, and emotional well-being, HABTIC is launching now in The Netherlands, with Germany and UK/US soon to follow...

awards.title: Best Male Audiobook Performance (K-12)
awards.description: I produced and directed The Cat's Maw Audiobook Experience, which won an award for the brilliant performance of acclaimed voice talent DAVID KAYE (Transformers series, Avengers Assembled, Pixar's UP, Last Week Tonight w/John Oliver)

awards.title: BEST YA MYSTERY NOVEL (The Cat's Maw)

Transmedia Grant Winner
awards.description: Awarded for best multiplatform IP pitch for Waposbay.com

awards.description: Writing grant for festure film and multiplatform narrative

awards.title: Audience Award Winner
awards.description: The prestigious SUNDANCE Film Festival capped off it's inaugural Digital Awards by bestowing my animated comic epic BROKEN SAINTS with the honor!

contributors.headline: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.
Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.

projects.title: OZ: Broken Kingdom
projects.description:
THE STORY
‘Battle the Great Darkness that has cast its shadow across the peaceful Land of Oz. Join the kingdom’s brave new heroine Ophelia Shen, along with Oz’s legendary heroes – Tin Man, Lion, and Scarecrow – as they embark on an epic quest to stop the rising evil, restore the balance of magic, and return the kingdom to its rightful glory!’

THE GAME
This graphically stunning and brilliantly designed free-to-play RPG epic from This Game Studio and NEXON— with a book’s worth of new characters and dialogue proudly penned by yours truly — was showcased at the Sept 7 Apple Event as a launch game for the slick new iPhone7.

contributors.headline: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.

projects.title: THE SHADOWLAND SAGA
projects.description: The acclaimed fantasy/horror YA saga starts here! From Gaiman-esque prose to the AAA enhanced audio production feat. the amazing DAVID KAYE (Transformers, Last Week: Tonight, Ratchet & Clank), this emotional epic is for brave young readers and isteners...and cat lovers of all ages!  Volume I (The Cat's Maw) was released in late Fall 2014 to resounding critical acclaim (Guardian, Kirkus, Midwest Book Review) and multiple awards.

contributors.headline: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.

projects.title: IRON MAIDEN: Legacy of the Beast
projects.description: Contracted to create a high-concept and narrative design treatment for a mobile free-to-play RPG that would harness (and celebrate) the music and imagery of multi-platinum global heavy metal icons IRON MAIDEN.  Tapping into my love for mythology, classic archetypes, 'multiverse theory', and fantasy/horror imagery, this one was a joy to be a part of!

contributors.headline: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.

projects.title: MILTON'S SECRET
projects.description:
PLATFORM:  Interactive APP / Feature Film (2013)

GENRE:  Developmental / Lifestyle / Family

CLIENT:   HULO FILMS / BARNET BAIN  

As a Digital Media Producer on the project, I have consulted on:

-  Script Review
-  One-Sheet Design
-  Transmedia Campaign
-  App Design
-  Pitch Package

PROJECT SUMMARY

Following in the footsteps of the Conscious Parenting movement – and tapping into the life-changing principles touted by celebrated author ECKHART TOLLE – The Conscious Parenting Guide will be a groundbreaking ‘lifestyle application’ that harnesses the unique tablet interface to foster personal and situational awareness for families. Our platform will use these unique interactive experiences to drill to the core of consciousness; across a broad spectrum of ‘gamified exercises’, users will focus on breath control, listening skills, and expanded ‘body awareness’ to navigate group and individual challenges.  Over the course of the program, they will share their experiences, journal personal progress, and be encouraged to download new exercises and reference material to further their growth.   Like any muscle or skill, we firmly believe such engagement over time will yield strength and proficiency – in effect, a deeper understanding of themselves, each other, and powerful tools to cope with emotions, stress, and personal conflict.

contributors.headline: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.
Director of Marketing at WBM Technologies

projects.title: RISEN
projects.description:
High concept teen sci-fi in the vein of Chronicle, Matrix, and the Lawnmower Man:  

"Locked away in a remote orphanage, a disabled teen has dark visions of a coming war between human consciousness and Artificial Intelligence.  Little does he realize that the battle will be waged WITHIN him, and the fate of the human race is his to decide!"

contributors.headline: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.
Director of Marketing at WBM Technologies

projects.title: The Way: A True Love Story
projects.description: A contemporary romantic-drama set on the legendary Santiago De Compostela pilgrimage trail across northern Spain.

contributors.headline: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.

projects.title: Broken Saints
projects.description: The world's first Motion Comic Epic!  24 haunting and hypnotic chapters combine for over 10hrs of apocalyptic and multi award-winning storytelling.  In the quite corners of the globe, four strangers receive a message...a cryptic call that is somehow tied to a global satellite network, a military implant project, an aging Buddhist monk, and a mysterious orphan in the South Pacific.  What would you give...to know the Truth?

contributors.headline: Creative Producer. Narrative Director. Cat Herder. Dadbod.
